fields.headline: Pick of the week: Comedy
fields.bodyText: Mark Maier, Ricky Grover Jongleurs, Portsmouth Saturday 2 Witty insightful comedy from Maier and cockney comedy from ex-hairdresser and boxer Grover. Stephen Merchant Gulbenkian Theatre, Canterbury Monday 4 Ricky Gervais' better half starts a low-key tour trying out new material, with support from Glaswegian observational comedian Stephen Carlin.
